text: Tomaderake abasya'i tomadera dhana-sampada o jibane pariksa kara habe. Tomadera age yaderake kitaba deya hayechila tadera ebam musarikadera kacha theke tomara aneka kastadayaka katha sunabe. Yadi tomara dhairya dharana kara ebam takâ€Œoya abalambana kara tabe niscaya'i ta habe drrha sankalpera kaja
